p.d: For this first programme from the Fine Arts Museum in Lille, Anne-Sophie Lapix receives the actor Daniel Auteuil, the dancer and director of the ballet of the Paris Opera Aurélie Dupont and opera singers Roberto Alagna and Aleksandra Kurzak. Featuring the national orchestra of Lille, conducted by Alexandre Bloch. Guests: Daniel Auteuil, Aurélie Dupont, Roberto Alagna, Aleksandra Kurzak, Angélique Kidjo, Vanessa Paradis, Bigflo & Oli, Daniel Lozakovich, Jain, Yoann Bourgeois, Emmanuelle Béart, Laurent Stocker, Yvan Cassar, Brigitte, Compagnie Juste Debout, Alexandre Bloch, Ludmila Pagliero, Hugo Marchand... Presented by: Anne-Sophie Lapix.
